figure.figDesc:
The research highlighted the adaptation of lesson plans in Street Law,
but there was no further evidence that adapting resources was seen or viewed as a
skill by the students. Further, in many other research papers on student skills
development from both clinical legal education and more specifically Street Law; the
ability to adapt, develop and edit other people's work is rarely, if not ever, recognised.
